purpose: The email announces a special issue on Emerging Concerns in Technical Debt Management for publication in the Empirical Software Engineering (EMSE) journal. It invites contributions that investigate how emerging concerns in AI, data-intensive systems, and other evolving domains affect the understanding and management of technical debt. The email outlines the scope, topics of interest, and submission guidelines for potential authors.
evidence_sentences: We are pleased to announce a special issue focusing on Emerging Concerns in Technical Debt Management for publication in Empirical Software Engineering (EMSE).
This special issue invites contributions investigating how emerging concerns in AI, data-intensive systems, and other evolving domains affect our understanding and management of TD.
We encourage submissions that clearly motivate and justify the 'novelty' of the systems or concerns being studied, particularly in relation to existing TD literature.
Topics of Interest: We seek submissions that address the following topics or related areas.
